head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SAUER, ALVIN H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SAUER, ALVIN H.

block.p: SAUER--Alvin H. On Saturday April 21, 2007, of Wyckoff, NJ, formerly of Paterson. Beloved husband of Susan Low Sauer. Devoted father of Richard, Elizabeth, Stephanie, and Jennifer. Proud grandfather of Hannah, Jonah, Eli, Olivia, Gabriel, and the late Batya. President and founder of A.H. Sauer & Associates. A commercial real estate firm, Route 4, Paramus, NJ. Services 12 noon, Tuesday,April 24, 2007, at Barnert Temple, 747 Route 208 South, Franklin Lakes, NJ. For further information please call 201-848-1800.
